skilllist.skilldesc:
Upon taking fatal damage, Aurora freezes herself for 1.5s, becoming invincible during this time and gradually recovering 30% Max HP. This effect has a 150s cooldown.

Aurora's freeze effects can also affect Turrets.

Aurora summons an icy meteorite to strike at the target location, dealing 400<font color="62f8fe"> (+90% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and slowing targets hit by 40% for 1s. Afterward, 5 hailstones fall, each dealing 40<font color="62f8fe"> (+10% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>.

Aurora blows Frosty Breeze in a fan-shaped area in the target direction, dealing 225<font color="62f8fe"> (+75% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit, and creating a frozen area at the far-end of the attack that deals a total of 225<font color="62f8fe"> (+75% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the area and freezes them for 1s.

Aurora creates a frost path in the target direction, dealing 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the path and reducing their Movement Speed by 80% for 1.2s. The frost path gradually becomes glaciers that spread until reaching their maximum size and shattering, dealing 600<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to all enemies in the area and freezing targets for 1s. Every 100 Magic Power that Aurora has will increase the freeze duration by 0.2s.

data.name: Aurora

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: Gank lanes whenever the Ultimate is ready.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+30 Magic Power
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

recommendmasterplan.name: ONIC SANZ
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

recommendmasterplan.name: FCON.Px7
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: The Maiden of the Glacier who grants eternal remembrance in the legends of the North.

assist.desc: With her very powerful CC abilities, Aurora works well with heroes who deal high sustained damage, like Ixia, Freya, and Karrie.

strong.desc: Aurora counters heroes who like to charge in, such as Leomord, Thamuz, and Terizla, since her skills can stop them dead in their tracks.

weak.desc: Because most of Aurora's skills have delayed effects, she is countered by high mobility heroes who can dodge them with ease, such as Ling, Kadita, and Guinevere.
